headline: Las Vegas Sands (NYSE:LVS) Completes US$4,739 Million Buyback & Declares US$0.25 Dividend
summary: Las Vegas Sands (NYSE:LVS) experienced a 7.91% increase in its share price over the last week, coinciding with several noteworthy developments. The company executed a substantial share buyback, repurchasing 10 million shares valued at $450 million, potentially influencing shareholder sentiment positively. Additionally, Las Vegas Sands affirmed its quarterly dividend, signaling stability in shareholder returns. However, financial results for the first quarter reflected lower year-over-year...

headline: Las Vegas Sands Q1 Earnings & Revenues Fall Short of Estimates

headline: Las Vegas Sands slaps down worries that U.S.-China tensions could threaten its Macau casinos
summary: "We have an incredible relationship with Beijing," CEO Rob Goldstein said on the casino operator's earnings call.
